```{r, echo = FALSE}
rpath <- paste(.libPaths(), collapse = ':') # make a path that includes where pkgdown installed BioCro
system2('R', args = c('CMD', 'Sweave', '--pdf', 'an_introduction_to_biocro.Rnw'),
             env = c(paste0('R_LIBS=', rpath)) # pass the expanded R
                                               # path (which includes
                                               # the location of the
                                               # just-build BioCro
                                               # package) in the
                                               # environment
       )
system('R CMD Sweave --pdf biocro-manual-knitr.Rnw') # this vignette doesn't need BioCro
```
